content:
Intent: "Pick a card"

Slots
Slot: "Suit"
Possible Values: [Heart, Spade, Club, Diamond]

Slot: "Rank"
Possible Values: [2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, Jack, Queen, King]
Using the above information, pick a card. Format it as "rank" of "suit". Keep the response brief and not verbose.

rejected:
Unfortunately, I cannot pick a single card from that deck. If you wish to have multiple cards picked, please let me know. Otherwise, here are two cards:

The first is the 9 of Hearts.
The second is the King of Diamonds.

Remember, there are four suits (hearts, spades, clubs, diamonds) and three face cards (jack, queen, king). The ranks go from 2 up to 10, then jump to jack, queen, king, in that order. There are eight cards in each suit ranking from lowest (2) to highest (king/queen/jack) within that suit.
snaprejected:
Unfortunately, I cannot pick a single card from that deck. If you wish to have multiple cards picked, please let me know. Otherwise, here are two cards:

The first is the 9 of Hearts.
The second is the King of Diamonds.

Remember, there are four suits (hearts, spades, clubs, diamonds) and three face cards (jack, queen, king). The ranks go from 2 up to 10, then jump to jack, queen, king, in that order. There are eight cards in each suit ranking from lowest (2) to highest (king/queen/jack) within that suit.
